text: <@U38EZFVFE> but how do I add that to the fields themselves directly on the GUI side for a specific field?
I think you are asking how to bring in dynamic tags, and I don’t think you can do that.
You’d need to set them up

<@U25PYL3Q8>, thank you for clarifying what I was trying to explain, yeah basically I was trying to figure out when setting up a Tag field can display only certain tags in the the drop down when content editors are adding content, so when they use that field they do not see all Tags but only specific tags that match tags that contain “Content Type”
